casebody.data:
No. 11-356. Lufkin Industries, Inc., Petitioner v. Sylvester McClain, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, et al. 565 U.S. 1036, 132 S. Ct. 589,

181 L. Ed. 2d 423,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8265. November 14, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 649 F.3d 374.
